structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
INTERCITY, INTERCOUNTY AND CITY-COUNTY COMPACTS FOR PURCHASING AND MERIT SYSTEMS -- RETIREMENT AND DISABILITY PLANS FOR EMPLOYEES OF COUNTIES AND CITIES

law.catch_line: Construction, maintenance of street forming common boundary, contract for.
law.text: Any two (2) cities or a city and a county having any part of a public street as a common boundary line may contract to share the cost of construction, reconstruction, repair and maintenance of the street or sidewalk along the common boundary or any portion thereof.
